tasks.label: API: dev
args: cd '${workspaceFolder}\apps\api'; if (!(Test-Path .venv\Scripts\python.exe)) { py -m venv .venv; .\.venv\Scripts\python.exe -m pip install --upgrade pip; .\.venv\Scripts\python.exe -m pip install -r requirements-dev.txt }; .\.venv\Scripts\python.exe -m uvicorn app.main:app --reload --port 8000
